definition: vestigial residue/a throwback (to a former age)
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: The parallel prose of early Tang Dynasty carried forward the character of those in Six Dynasties and possessed features of the new period.
sentences.chinese: 初唐駢文繼承了六朝駢文餘緒，又有新時代的特點。
